page.title: 16Law and order
page.content: There used to be a{Policeman}stationed in the village of Kenninghall up until about two years ago.With cut backs etc., the life of the village Policeman has changed dramatically with them having to cover a{larger {area}for their beat, anything within a 30 mile radius.Therefore the village Police stations are not manned all the time. The nearest Police stations to Kenninghall are{Thetford,} Attleborough or Diss.We are quite well endowed with{Prisons,}there is one in Norwich and a new one just opened at Griston.There are also several open remand prisons around the area to deal with the less hardened criminal. {Community Service}is quite prolific in the area, also we are well endowed with our Probation Officers.
